mapper.select: SELECT A.CORP_CD , A.CORP_NM , A.CORP_ADDR FROM TBL_CORP A WHERE A.CORP_ADDR iLIKE '%'||#{userAddr}||'%' OR A.CUR_ADDR iLIKE '%'||#{curAddr}||'%' AND A.USE_YN = TRUE LIMIT 10

SELECT A.CORP_CD , C.CORP_NM , C.CORP_ADDR , A.ITEM_CD , B.ITEM_NM , B.ITEM_PRC , A.SALE_PRC , A.SALE_AMT , A.DISCOUNT_RAT , A.ITEM_EXPDATE FROM TBL_GOODS A INNER JOIN TBL_ITEM B ON A.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD INNER JOIN TBL_CORP C ON B.CORP_CD = C.CORP_CD WHERE A.ITEM_EXPDATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND C.CORP_ADDR iLIKE '%'||#{curAddr}||'%' LIMIT 10
